history.change: - Unfortunately the project is closed. You can delete this provider. Please don't remember general rules of investment: 1) Don't invest your last funds. 2) Don't invest credits. 3) Invest only that you don't afraid to lose. 4) Always be ready to force-majeur. 5) Diversificate.
- Another adaptation to the new design
- Added counter: Amount - Changed all counters to non-optional - Icon changed
- Adaptation to the new design of empfinance.com - Added preference: select mirror - library.js updated - Icon changed
- Added counters: Account Balance (PM), Account Balance (Ego), Account Balance (Wire)
